descriptions.title: An Overview of the Dzongpa Sakya Tradition
descriptions.content: The Dzongpa (rdzong pa) order was based at Dzong monastery (rdzong dgon pa) in Tsang (gtsang) by a contemporary of Ngorchen (ngor chen), Dzongpa Künga Zangpo (rdzong pa kun dga' rnam rgyal). (Ronald Davidson – June 21, 2004)
